programme.title: Maikla Portillo garās nedēļas nogales
programme.desc: Maikls Portillo mūs ved uz savām iecienītajām Eiropas pilsētām: Madridi, Prāgu, Stokholmu, Lisabonu, Milānu un Palermo. Katrā raidījumā Maikls atklās noslēpumus, vietas un cilvēkus, kas šīs pilsētas padara unikālas, un izpētīs labākos restorānus, bārus, ēdienu tirgus un viesnīcas, kā arī vietas, ko ir iecienījuši vietējie iedzīvotāji. Maikls mūs iepazīstinās gan ar karaļu pilīm, katedrālēm, mākslas galerijām un muzejiem, gan ar mazāk pazīstamiem rajoniem prom no tūristu iecienītajām takām, un parādīs, kā tikai vienā nedēļas nogalē atklāt īsto pilsētu. Katrā pilsētā Maikls tiksies arī ar vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, kas viņam parādīs pilsētas apslēptos dārgumus.

programme.title: Kultūršoks
programme.desc: Kultūra ir ne vien māksla, bet arī nauda, projekti, ražošana un gan radoši, gan postoši konflikti. Par kultūrvides problēmām un šokējošām atklāsmēm — raidījums "Kultūršoks".

programme.title: Province
programme.desc: Jau trešo gadu desmitu Aglonas bazilikas Kora skola pulcē jaunos talantus. Tur var mācīties dziedāt, spēlēt kokli, flautu, ērģeles. Mazajiem ērģelniekiem tiek uzticēts pavadīt Sv. Misi bazilikā, pat ja sīkie pirkstiņi nevar izstiepties oktāvas garumā un kājas vēl nesniedzas līdz apakšējiem ērģeļu pedāļiem. Bet visādi citādi Aglonas bazilikas Kora skola ir vieta, kur bijušie audzēkņi atgriežas jau pedagogu statusā, jo viņos ieaudzināta atbildība par savu vietu, savu baziliku, savu skolu, savu Latgali.

programme.title: Ķepa uz sirds
programme.desc: Informatīvi izklaidējošs raidījums visai ģimenei par dzīvnieku pareizu kopšanu un audzināšanu, speciālistu padomiem un ieteikumiem, kā arī dzīvnieku aizsardzības jautājumiem un daudzām citām aktuālām tēmām.

programme.title: Personas kods
programme.desc: Žurnālistes Baibas Šmites vadītais portretraidījums "Personas kods" ielūkojas arhīva materiālos, sarunājoties ar mūsu laikabiedriem par viņu attieksmi pret sabiedrības virmojumiem vakar, šodien, rīt. Projekta idejas autors – Rolands Tjarve.

programme.title: Personas kods
programme.desc: Žurnālistes Baibas Šmites vadītais portretraidījums "Personas kods" ielūkojas arhīva materiālos, sarunājoties ar mūsu laikabiedriem par viņu attieksmi pret sabiedrības virmojumiem vakar, šodien, rīt. Projekta idejas autors – Rolands Tjarve.

programme.title: Personas kods
programme.desc: Žurnālistes Baibas Šmites vadītais portretraidījums "Personas kods" ielūkojas arhīva materiālos, sarunājoties ar mūsu laikabiedriem par viņu attieksmi pret sabiedrības virmojumiem vakar, šodien, rīt. Projekta idejas autors – Rolands Tjarve.

programme.title: Viesnīca pie jūras
programme.desc: Katru vasaru Andersena viesnīca pie jūras laipni ver savas durvis turīgajiem un dažkārt untumainajiem apmeklētājiem jeb, kā viņus dēvē viesnīcas kalpotāji, pilsētniekiem. Kamēr viesnīcas īpašnieki sagaida savus ikgadējos viesus, kalpotāju vidū tiek uzņemta jaunā Fija. Skaistajā viesnīcā viesu un kalpotāju dzīves sajaucas krāšņā kaleidoskopā, kurā netrūkst ne jautru brīžu, ne noslēpumu. Seriāls ieguvis skatītāju atzinību - no 2016. līdz pat 2020. gadam tas bija skatītākais seriāls Dānijā - un ir saņēmis daudzas kinobalvu nominācijas.

programme.title: Pie stūres
programme.desc: Deutsche Welle žurnāls

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Biatlons. Pasaules kauss Ansī vīriešiem
programme.desc: Vīriešiem sprintā jāveic 10 kilometri, līdz ar to tas ir nedaudz atšķirīgs aplis, taču būtība tā pati - ātri jāslēpo un gana ātri un precīzi jāšauj. Par katru kļūdu šaušanā ir viens 150 metrus garš soda aplis. Pirms gada savu pirmo lielo uzvaru izdevās izcīnīt jaunajam norvēģim Martinam Uldālam, kas ir ļoti ātrs šāvējs un toreiz nekļūdīgi sašāva visus desmit mērķus. Šaušanas ātruma rekordu toreiz gan vēl Uldāls neuzstādīja, to viņš sasniedza sezonas otrajā pusē - stāvus 12,5 sekundēs sašauti visi pieci mērķi. Vēl trijniekā Ansī tika cits norvēģis Juhanness Tīngnēss Bē (nu jau beidzis aktīvā sporta gaitas) un zviedrs Sebastians Samuelsons. Andrejs Rastorgujevs ar diviem soda apļiem bija 28. pozīcijā. Jauna sezona, jau nedaudz citi favorīti, bet savās mājās noteikti spēcīgi būs Francijas sportisti, īpaši Eriks Pero, arī Emiljēns Žaklēns un Kventins Fijons Maijē. Šosezon labi sevi pieteicis Samuelsons, tāpat Kempbels Raits no ASV, arī jaunais norvēģis Izaks Frejs. Andrejs Rastorgujevs tieši sezonas startā atsvaidzināja kādu senu savainojumu, bet jācer, ka tagad viss būs kārtībā.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Divas šķietami nesaistītas slepkavības vieno kāds mistisks, tomēr taustāms pavediens - pie mirušā atrasta Taro kārts. Izmeklētāju komanda ķeras pie ezotērikas pasaules izpētes, lai starp Taro kārtīm, to licējiem un klientiem atrastu saiknes, kas palīdzētu notvert slepkavu, kam padomā ir vēl kāds noziegums. Par laimi, Reksim šajā raibajā jūklī izdodas saglabāt vēsu prātu un, liekot kājas lietā, notvert bēguļojošo ļaundari.

programme.title: Maikla Portillo garās nedēļas nogales
programme.desc: Maikls Portillo mūs ved uz savām iecienītajām Eiropas pilsētām: Madridi, Prāgu, Stokholmu, Lisabonu, Milānu un Palermo. Katrā raidījumā Maikls atklās noslēpumus, vietas un cilvēkus, kas šīs pilsētas padara unikālas, un izpētīs labākos restorānus, bārus, ēdienu tirgus un viesnīcas, kā arī vietas, ko ir iecienījuši vietējie iedzīvotāji. Maikls mūs iepazīstinās gan ar karaļu pilīm, katedrālēm, mākslas galerijām un muzejiem, gan ar mazāk pazīstamiem rajoniem prom no tūristu iecienītajām takām, un parādīs, kā tikai vienā nedēļas nogalē atklāt īsto pilsētu. Katrā pilsētā Maikls tiksies arī ar vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, kas viņam parādīs pilsētas apslēptos dārgumus.

programme.title: Šerifs
programme.desc: Kapteinis Kaders Šerifs ļoti mīl savu darbu policijā. Viņš dzīvo tieši pretī policijas iecirknim. Gadiem zināms kā radikālu izmeklēšanas metožu piekritējs, Kaders sastopas ar jauno kapteini, Kadera partneri Adelīnu Briāru. Abi pretpoli, kuri tik ļoti darbā pievelkas, izrādās visai dinamisks policistu pāris! Alžīriešu izcelsmes franču aktieris Abdelhafids Metalsi televīzijā strādā kopš 2000. gadu sākuma, un šarmantais kapteinis Kaders ir viņa līdz šim spilgtākā loma.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Stefans un Bruno aiztur kādu speciālo aģentu Īvu Martēnu. Bruno atkal izjautā vectēvu Leo, lai uzzinātu vairāk informācijas Roberto Mendeza lietā, bet Leo atsakās likt melu detektoru. Atklājas satraucoši fakti Teo Gaņona lietā, kur visus lēmumus pieņēma Nadīne.

programme.title: Dzelzs tvēriens
programme.desc: Fon Ērihu ğimenes vīrieši dzīvo tikai cīņas sportam - reslingam. Tēvs, pats savas karjeras laikā nespējis iegūt čempiona titulu, dara visu, lai kāds no viņa dēliem īstenotu viņa sapni. Par spīti tam, ka brāļi ir ļoti saliedēti un iestājas cits par citu, viņu vidū valda sīva konkurence. Taču fon Ērihu ģimeni vajā nelaimes - šķiet, ka viņiem uzlikts lāsts.

programme.title: Īlona Maska "Twitter" revolūcija
programme.desc: Dokumentālā filma "Īlona Maska "Twitter" revolūcija" pievēršas Maska ilgajām un bieži vien problemātiskajām attiecībām ar "Twitter". Režisors Džeimss Džakobijs pēta Īlona Maska pieaugošo ietekmi un iztaujā kompānijas pārstāvjus un industrijas ekspertus. Filma vēsta par "Twitter" pārpirkšanu, vārda brīvības problēmām un kompānijas neskaidro nākotni. Dokumentālās filmas "Īlona Maska "Twitter" revolūcija" pirmā daļa vēsta par to, kā Masks no aizrautīga platformas lietotāja kļuva par tās vienīgo īpašnieku. Režisors Džeimss Džakobijs sarunājas ar daudziem cilvēkiem, tostarp ar žurnālisti Karu Svišeri, biogrāfu Volteru Aizaksonu un daudziem bijušajiem "Twitter" darbiniekiem. Filma runā par absolūtu vārda brīvību, par nepatiesas informācijas izplatīšanu platformā un par "Twitter" kā ziņu avota lomu ārkārtas situāciju un krīžu laikā.

programme.title: V.I.P. - Veiksme. Intuīcija. Prāts
programme.desc: Šī spēle ir mūsu kopīgais ieguldījums labdarības maratonā "Dod pieci!", lai palīdzētu bērniem ar kustību traucējumiem — tiem, kam ikdienas soļi prasa īpašu spēku. Kapteiņi: Toms Grēviņš un Kārlis Kazāks. Toms Grēviņš - komandas kapteinis, labdarības maratonā "Dod pieci!" iesaistīts kopš tā pirmās reizes Latvijā 2014. gadā. Toms ir arī Latvijas Radio 5 "tētis" kopš 2013. gada, kad pirmo reizi ieskandinājis Latvijas Radio 5 - Pieci.lv. Viņš ir neatņemama sastāvdaļa radio, televīzijas un Latvijas šovu industrijas rīkotajos projektos un pasākumos. Toms ir dīdžejs un mūzikas žurnālists. Latvijas Radio 5 vada raidījumu "Vēl viens starts". Kopš 2023. gada sākuma vada pēcpusdienas raidījumu "Starpbrīdis". Agnese Ducena-Saidāne - fizioterapeite, mācījusies Rīgas 6. vidusskolā un vēlāk Rīgas Stradiņa universitātē. Brīvajā laikā dejo tautas dejas kolektīvā "Ūsiņš" un dzied Ķekavas jauktajā korī "Mozaīka". Ļoti labprāt dodas tuvākos un tālākos ceļojumos kopā ar ģimeni, kurā aug divi dēli. Patīk aktīvi pavadīt laiku - daudzus gadus ir spēlējusi florbolu, joprojām vasarās spēlē volejbolu, apmeklē zumbas nodarbības. Kā ikgadēja ģimenes tradīcija ir arī "Dod pieci!" maratona atbalstīšana. Raimonds Rudzāts - Latvijas Televīzijas sporta žurnālists. Saņēmis Latvijas Žurnālistu asociācijas speciālbalvu par izcilību sporta žurnālistikā, atzīts par Latvijas Televīzijas gada redaktoru-tvērēju 2022. gadā. Kopā ar domubiedriem 2020. gadā dibinājis "R. R. Fondu", kas nodrošina iespēju ikdienā apmeklēt ārpusskolas nodarbības bērniem ar ne tiem vieglākajiem sadzīves apstākļiem. Izveidota mentoru programma, kurā pieaugušie brīvprātīgi sniedz atbalstu ikdienas gaitās jauniešiem ar grūtībām skolā. Raimonds pats ir labdarības projekta iniciators un allaž atbalsta citus projektus. Kārlis Kazāks - komandas kapteinis, mūziķis, Latvijas Radio 5 - Pieci.lv direktors. Kārlis ar azartiskiem kolēģiem liek kopā jaunākās mūzikas un daudzpusīgas informācijas puzles gabaliņus Latvijas Radio 5 saturā un uztur sarunas pavedienu ar mūsu valsts cilvēkiem Latvijas Radio 1 raidījumā "Monopols". Debija mūzikā notika 1996. gadā grupas "Dull Doll" sastāvā, 2000. gadā Kazāks dibināja grupu "Oceanfall". 2008. gadā izdeva savu pirmo solo albumu "Uz manām plaukstām", šobrīd izdoti jau vairāki solo albumi. Kā mūziķis darbojies arī fondā "Viegli". Baiba Narvila - profesionālais ceļš 15 gadus ir veltīts fizioterapijai, cilvēku veselības stiprināšanai un izglītošanai. Uzņēmēja un augstskolas lektore, kurai svarīgi dalīties zināšanās un iedvesmot citus. Labdarībā iesaistās ne tikai ar ziedojumiem - ilgtermiņā aktīvi darbojas kā brīvprātīgā "Mentor Latvia" programmā, kas paredzēta jauniešiem no sociālā riska grupām, sniedzot emocionālu atbalstu, drošu pieaugušā klātbūtni un iedrošinājumu veidot veselīgus ieradumus. Patīk pārbaudīt savas iespēju robežas - gan ledainās peldēs, gan ejot pāri kvēlojošām oglēm. Matīss Vecvagaris - pedagogs, portāla LSM.lv tautas sporta sadaļas autors, labdarības 107 km garā skrējiensoļojuma organizators distancē Rīga-Valmiera. 10 gadu laikā skrējēju saime bērniem ar kustību traucējumiem saziedojuši vairāk nekā 60 000 eiro. Motivācija arvien turpināt rīkot šo skrējienu ir vecāku atsūtītie video, kur redzams bērnu progress pēc fizioterapijas nodarbībām rehabilitācijas centrā. Paša pieveikto ultramaratonu skaits pārsniedz pussimtu. Šoruden PČ diennakts skrējienā Francijā pieveicis 249 kilometrus, ieņemot 28. vietu.

programme.title: Province
programme.desc: Jau trešo gadu desmitu Aglonas bazilikas Kora skola pulcē jaunos talantus. Tur var mācīties dziedāt, spēlēt kokli, flautu, ērģeles. Mazajiem ērģelniekiem tiek uzticēts pavadīt Sv. Misi bazilikā, pat ja sīkie pirkstiņi nevar izstiepties oktāvas garumā un kājas vēl nesniedzas līdz apakšējiem ērģeļu pedāļiem. Bet visādi citādi Aglonas bazilikas Kora skola ir vieta, kur bijušie audzēkņi atgriežas jau pedagogu statusā, jo viņos ieaudzināta atbildība par savu vietu, savu baziliku, savu skolu, savu Latgali.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru
programme.desc: Security teams at Lima, Perus airport work 24-7 to stop illegal activity. The biggest threat: cocaine smuggling. Handmade mats include additional handiwork: 100s of bags of cocaine. A student on vacation is carrying more than keepsakes: a hidden compartment hides cocaine. A Latvian carrier wants to cooperate. Cocaine hidden inside a wooden sculpture of Jesus Christ. Police listen in as a carrier takes a call from his contact.

programme.title: Witches: Truth Behind the Trials
programme.desc: The story of Scotlands first major witch trials. When storms threaten the sinking of ships carrying King James VI of Scotland and his future wife, blame focusses on so-called witches, sparking a determination in the King to hunt, torture and eliminate them. Cinematic reconstructions, analysis and expert interviews uncover the truth behind our popular conceptions of witches and witchcraft.

programme.title: Witches: Truth Behind the Trials
programme.desc: Sweden remains largely unaffected by witch trials until an event known as The Great Noise sees hysteria spread across the country, driven by children telling stories of Blåkulla, a fantastical place they are taken to by witches who cavort with the Devil. Cinematic reconstruction, analysis and expert interviews shed light on this horrific and brutal event in Swedish history.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Episode two begins with the horrific fire at Notre Dame Cathedral in the spring of 2019. Multiple eye- witnesses captured the raging flames on their phone cameras, but what they couldnt capture was the frantic, behind-the-scenes confusion and infrastructure fail that contributed to making the fire much more devastating than it should have been. We take viewers behind the scenes. Next, we take a take a look at scaffolding, an integral piece of construction equipment. When it fails, the results can be catastrophic. But why does it fail? We examine the reasons through multiple examples.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Glass may be the most popular construction material in the modern age. But constructing with glass is challenging and dangerous. It spontaneously breaks and falls from skyscrapers and it even crushes warehouse workers. We investigate the scientific anomaly of nickel sulfide inclusion and its effect on glass The vast majority of demolitions rely on the excavator to bring the building down. In this story we witness the perfect way to do it and contrast it with multiple examples of demolition by excavator fails. Operator error, unstable ground, unpredictable fall angles - we show it all.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. programme.title: The Armstrong Tapes
programme.desc: ARMSTRONG is a one-hour documentary film that provides a personal and in-depth look at the first man to set foot on the moon: Neil Armstrong. Although his iconic words are known throughout the world, the man behind them has long remained a mystery. ARMSTRONG uses interviews with his only authorized biographer, friends, and family members, as well as archival audio tapes of interviews conducted with Armstrong himself, to craft an intimate look at one of the worlds greatest and least-understood heroes.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: The 48-acre St. James Gate Brewery is situated smack bang in the middle of Irelands capital city, Dublin. Guinness is the most popular dark beer on the planet. Globally, the megabrewer sells over a billion pints a year in 150 countries. In this hour, we ride along for the busiest two months in Irish beer, from the massive spring barley harvest all the way through roasting, brewing, bottling, kegging, marketing, and distribution.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Step into the world of Megafactories, where we provide unprecedented access to these colossal manufacturing plants that churn out millions of products every year. From everyday items such as alcohol or tyres, to million-pound supercars and fighter jets, we unearth the fascinating history behind these products, and meet with the experts who design and produce them. Whether its the factories of Aston Martin, Learjet, Ford Mustang, Roller Coasters or EA Sports, youre sure to be dumbfounded by the level of perfection these workers adhere to. Narrated by British actor Tony Hirst.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Australias Howard and Sons have been making fireworks for almost 100 years, now the reigns have been handed down to a new generation and they are breaking with tradition. Andrew and Christian Howard along with show designer Stuart Bensley are competing in the 2011 International Festival des Feux in Montreal with a new pyro musical, but will this break with convention see them leave Montreal with a crown or a frown?

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europes finest cultural and geographical landmarks as youve never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent - a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: Europe from Above takes to the air over Germany, Italy, the Netherlands, Poland, Spain and the UK to showcase Europes finest cultural and geographical landmarks as youve never seen them before. Stunning aerial hyper-lapse photography allows us to visualise the changes of a season in seconds, as tulip fields in the Netherlands magically burst into colour and waterfalls in the Dolomites turn to ice. We reveal how tradition, engineering and natural wonders have shaped this epic continent - a vibrant portrait of these regions and the people who keep their traditions alive.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As they enter the second and most challenging phase of dogfighting, everything is on the line for our students. Defensive dogfighting involves dynamic maneuvers to evade being shot down by battle-hardened instructors. The physical strain proves too much for one student, while another has a crisis of confidence when past failures come back to haunt him.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In the high-octane competitive world of the U.S. Navys toughest fighter pilot school, only the strong succeed. This world exclusive takes the viewer inside the final grueling six months of training and selection, where the students learn how to fly combat missions. Dreams of earning strike pilot wings collide with the harsh reality of the most rigorous tests yet. We are inside the cockpit as they tackle adrenaline-fueled, dynamic aerial tests, each designed to push the students to their limits and beyond and not all will pass the test.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route from Moscow to Perm, Russia, Aeroflot Nord Flight 821 is on its final approach when the plane nosedives and crashes onto the trans-Siberian railway. All thats left of the Boeing 737 is charred wreckage. All 88 people on board are confirmed dead. At first, investigators suspect a known design flaw in the aircrafts rudder. But as they dig deeper, they make a series of shocking discoveries that will result in calls to transform the countrys aviation system.

programme.title: Petra: Secrets of the Ancient Builders
programme.desc: In the heart of the Jordanian desert, the ancient city of Petra is full of mysteries. How was this architectural prowess achieved more than 2,000 years ago?

programme.title: Buried Secrets of Cordoba
programme.desc: National Geographic follows archaeologist and explorer Fabio Amador on a fascinating voyage to unveil the ancient mysteries that lie beneath the modern streets of Cordoba, which dates back some 2,000 years. Fabio joins archaeologists and historians in the field as they use state-of-the-art technologies to discover and recreate Cordobas forgotten past.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: When an Arctic storm kicks off the coldest winter of a decade, Thord tries to rescue a truck blocking a blind bend but the driver ignores Thords instructions and puts all their lives at risk. A blizzard causes chaos for Bjorn when a jackknifed truck blocks the road. And in the far north, a truck full of fish on a tight deadline crashes into a snowbank so rescue boss Jo Roger has to get it back on track.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The students face their final test in an iconic head-to-head dogfight against their instructors. To pass, they must bring all the skills they have learned during their advanced phase training. With graduation just days away, students start to worry about their final grades and whether they will get the posting they—and in many cases, their families—want.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: In the high-octane competitive world of the U.S. Navys toughest fighter pilot school, only the strong succeed. This world exclusive takes the viewer inside the final grueling six months of training and selection, where the students learn how to fly combat missions. We are inside the cockpit as they tackle adrenaline-fueled, dynamic aerial tests, each designed to push the students to their limits and beyond and not all will pass the test.

programme.title: Year Million
programme.desc: Advances in neuroscience and engineering are bringing us closer toward a reality first described in great science fiction, one in which artificial intelligence will become indistinguishable from - or perhaps even surpass - human intelligence. This could lead to a future in which AI beings become our essential collaborators or a threat to human value and life. What are the major milestones that are leading us towards this singularity, and how will that affect the evolution of the human species?

programme.title: Year Million
programme.desc: Science fiction documentary series, narrated by actor Laurence Fishburne and based on the book Year Million: Science at the Far Edge of Knowledge by Damien Broderick, explores what it will be like to be a human one million years into the future. The story alternates between the years 2050, 3000, 500,000 and Year Million, and some of todays brightest futurists, scientists, scholars and notable science fiction writers will guide viewers through the very latest advances in technology, ideas and innovations that will likely power the evolution of our species - artificial intelligence, man merging with machine, the human species becoming an interplanetary entity,... Each episode of the series is divided into narrated scenes, then interviews with scientists and futurologists, and the docudrama segments that revolve around a regular family in several different possible timelines through to the year 1,000,000 AD.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Step into the world of Megafactories, where we provide unprecedented access to these colossal manufacturing plants that churn out millions of products every year. From everyday items such as alcohol or tyres, to million-pound supercars and fighter jets, we unearth the fascinating history behind these products, and meet with the experts who design and produce them. Whether its the factories of Aston Martin, Learjet, Ford Mustang, Roller Coasters or EA Sports, youre sure to be dumbfounded by the level of perfection these workers adhere to. Narrated by British actor Tony Hirst.

programme.title: Megafactories
programme.desc: Australias Howard and Sons have been making fireworks for almost 100 years, now the reigns have been handed down to a new generation and they are breaking with tradition. Andrew and Christian Howard along with show designer Stuart Bensley are competing in the 2011 International Festival des Feux in Montreal with a new pyro musical, but will this break with convention see them leave Montreal with a crown or a frown?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Battle of Jutland was the most violent sea battle in history, fought in 1916 between the mighty battle fleets of Britain and Germany. After a day of carnage, both sides claimed victory. So who really won? Maritime archaeologists and historians go in search of Jutlands secrets, hidden deep underwater. Scientific data combines with computer graphics to drain the North Sea, investigating the mega battleships of World War One and asks what happened to them once the firing was over.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Pacific Ring of Fire - an underwater hotbed of volcanoes, mega-quakes and giant tsunamis. 500 million people live in ever-present danger along its edges. Combining CGI with cutting-edge ocean-mapping technology we drain the Pacific Ocean to reveal the deadly geological forces behind Earths most destructive natural disasters, and uncover catastrophic threats lying just off the coast of Seattle, Tokyo and New Zealand.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Just 4 minutes after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, on 4 November 2010, Qantas Flight 32 suffered an uncontained failure in one of its engines. The failure was the first of its kind for the Airbus A380, the worlds first double-deck jet airliner. Shrapnel from the engine damaged the fuel system and led to a series of failures, severely compromising the aircraft. The crew spent almost two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: In this programme, we examine the science behind some of the worlds most impressive, technologically advanced machines. What big ideas drove their evolution? How do they actually work? What sets each machine apart? Follow along for all the fascinating stories as we reveal the best-kept mechanical secrets that not only made these extraordinary machines work, but also changed the world in a big way.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: Earth protects itself from the sun. The David and Goliath story of Earths relationship with its greatest threat, our seemingly benign Sun. The Sun is the big violent boss of the Solar System throwing out devastating particles and deadly radiation. Without several shields, one generated by our unique planetary core, another by our atmosphere, and a third by our interconnected weather systems, life on Earth would never have survived.

programme.title: One Strange Rock
programme.desc: For the privileged few who have looked down at the Earth from space, the thin blue line of our planets sets the Earth apart from every other planet weve seen. It sustains life. The story of how the Earth creates and regulates that oxygen rich-atmosphere is mind-blowing: A flying river, a global dust storm, a collapsing glacier and the most important creature youve never heard of. All connected together to allow life and the planet to breathe.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1995, a bone of an extinct bear is found in a Slovenian cave that could rewrite our place in the story of evolution. The bone appears to be carved with intention by someone at least 10,000 years before humans arrived in that part of the world. Who made it and why? A simple black dress shoe sits in a glass case in the Heinz Nixdorf Museums Forum in Germany. The reason? More than just a shoe, this is a high-tech machine for its time, designed to do the impossible: beat the casino. And an intricate purple gemstone adorned with silver snakes, quartz scarabs and cryptic words, has a long history intertwined with illness, ruin, tragedy and death. Where did it originate, and could it really be cursed?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: In 1898, a stunning object shows up at the British Museum. Carved and polished from a single piece of quartz, it is shaped like an immaculate human skull. Is this a creation of Mesoamericans, as originally claimed? Why is it rumoured to possess supernatural power? A gruesome-looking chair from ancient China, housed at the Wellcome Collection in London, is covered in sword blades, spikes and ornate decorations. Clearly, this is no love seat. Is it some kind of torture device, or more than meets the eye? From a long-buried library in the lost Assyrian city of Nineveh comes a peculiar round tablet scribbled with cuneiform writing. Is it the work of astronomers, proof of an ancient apocalypse, or a 3,000-year-old instruction manual?

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations Puerto Rico arrest 37 members of a smuggling network responsible for multiple murders, and the import and export of cocaine on the island. Air and Marine operations agents in Mayaguez chase after a loaded vessel with $5.4 million in cocaine onboard. AMO agents in Fajardo investigate a party boat and discover a passenger on board entered the country illegally.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: Tropical Takedown
programme.desc: Homeland Security Investigations arrest multiple suspects across Puerto Rico involved in a drug smuggling ring linked to multiple murders. Air and Marine Operations agents in Fajardo seize$13.2 million worth of cocaine from an overturned vessel, while AMO agents in the U.S. Virgin Islands conduct a night operation to intercept smuggling vessels moving between the USVI and British Virgin Islands.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest air crashes in history have been caused by simple misunderstandings, and its a tiny error in the cockpit that brought tragedy to Quincy Airport in Illinois. Meanwhile, a minor mistake, a non-standard approach, and heavy smoke add up to a tragic misunderstanding that cost the lives of everyone on board Garuda Indonesia Flight 152. And, however disastrous, never has a misunderstanding taken as devastating a turn as on the island of Tenerife and the single deadliest aviation accident of all time.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation Special Report
programme.desc: It takes years of training to become an airline captain, but its when a crisis strikes that a pilot really earns his stripes. An airliner is crippled after takeoff from New Yorks LaGuardia Airport, and the courageous captain pulls off an amphibious landing in the Hudson River. A catastrophic failure strikes high above the Canadian Prairies turning a Boeing 767 into a very large and very heavy glider. And, when the engines of TACA Flight 110 flame out in a violent storm, its captain pulls off one of the most remarkable landings in the history of commercial aviation.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: In this opening episode, we recount the life of Chinggis Khan, beginning with the dramatic struggles of his early years, including his familys fall from power, his survival against rival tribes, and his first alliances as a young warrior determined to rescue his kidnapped wife, Borte.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: Temujin enlists a childhood friend called Jamuqa. Their close friendship eventually turns into rivalry. Temujin is defeated and is forced to spend 10 years with the Jin Empire. When he returns, Temujin reasserts his position on the Mongolian plains and has subjugated all who oppose him, including his former allies. Temujin takes the title by which he will forever be known: Chinggis Khan.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: After taking the title of khan, Chinggis consolidated power by building a formidable army and eliminating rivals like the shaman Teb Tengri. Chinggis began his conquests with bold campaigns against the Tanguts and the Jin Empires, where brutal sieges of the city involved bold new military maneuvers, expanding the Mongol Empire to unprecedented heights.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: When a neighboring empire attacks a Mongol caravan, Chinggis Khan unleashes a devastating campaign that annihilates the empire and solidifies Mongol dominance across the lands of Persia. As his health declines, he names his son Ogedei as his successor and leads one final campaign against the neighboring Tanguts before his death, leaving behind an empire that spans continents.

programme.title: Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols
programme.desc: After Chinggis Khans secret burial, his son Ogedei is proclaimed ruler of the Mongol Empire. He brings a very different leadership style as he conquers Armenia, Georgia and the Jin Empire. He orders the building of the grand capital of Karakorum and sets the stage for a brutal campaign against Kievan Rus, led by his nephew Batu and the veteran general Subudai.

programme.title: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
programme.desc: Hannah Fry travels to Vietnam, a land of staggering natural beauty, ancient traditions and some of the fastest growing skylines on earth. Over 1,600 km from the vibrant South to the historic North, she uncovers the story of the countrys remarkable post-war transformation. She immerses herself in the moped chaos in Ho Chi Minh City, helps with a muddy prawn harvest in the Mekong Delta and takes a restorative spa bath in the misty hilltops of Sapa. She ushers in the New Year with a local family celebrating the Tet festival and learns how a beloved dish, pho, tells a story of identity. In each place she visits, she meets characters whose lives have been shaped by both war and renewal. What emerges is a nation embracing change, where striking contrasts are balanced by a spirit of cooperation and strong family bonds.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The shroud of Turin is one of the most debated archaeological artifacts in the world. Is it the burial cloth of the Christian messiah, Jesus of Nazareth, or is it an elaborate fake? Every time the evidence points one way or another, a credible counter argument is raised. In the collective imagination of the mid-20th century, jetpacks were the personalized transportation of the future. American engineer Wendell Moore really did develop and test a model for the military, so why dont we all have one? Buried for 2,400 years, a pair of beautiful cups are discovered in a grave mound made by Scythians, an ancient civilization of the Caucasus Mountains. What can the cups be for if they have holes in the bottom? And why are they solid gold?

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Outside Draskow, Poland, an undocumented cemetery hundreds of years old is found in 2010 containing a womans skeleton with a blade on her stomach, a stone on her neck and a green color in her mouth. Was this strange burial a precaution against the living dead? During the cold war, the United States developed a surveillance tool that was the first of its kind—code name: Project Corona. Did the shiny golden dome really help avert nuclear Armageddon? Countless literati have studied Shakespeares plays for his profound prose, but what about for secret-coded messages? In the 1800s, Dr. Orville Ward Owen built a hulking wooden machine to do just that and concluded that Shakespeare was not who we think. Does his theory stand up to scrutiny?

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Turkish Airlines Flight 1951 was less than a mile from the runway at Amsterdam Schiphol Airport when it catastrophically crashed on 25 February 2009. The aircraft broke into three pieces on impact, killing nine passengers and crew and all three pilots. A faulty radio altimeter was the initial catalyst in a chain of errors that led to the horrific crash. In this episode, survivors tell their story of escaping from the wreckage of what should have been a normal commute home to Amsterdam..

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did the shuttle Columbia tear itself to pieces during reentry? Why did so many die in the worst high speed train crash in history at Eschede in Germany? How did a concrete high rise in London called Grenfell Tower become an inferno that killed 72?

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: In this programme, we examine the science behind some of the worlds most impressive, technologically advanced machines. What big ideas drove their evolution? In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: As the first national park founded to protect wildlife and ecological richness, the Everglades teems with life above and below water. This land of diversity boasts nine unique ecosystems, each shaped by the wet and dry seasons ebb and flow. Roseate spoonbills, black bears, alligators, bottlenose dolphins and panthers all thrive in the largest subtropical wilderness in North America.

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Tropical South: Land of Water. Travel to southern Vietnams tropical habitats, home to gibbons and playful macaques, green sea turtles, and Asian black bears.

programme.title: Wild Chile
programme.desc: The natural beauty of Chile is explored in this fascinating three-part documentary series from National Geographic, travelling the length, and width, of this unique, slender South American country. Each episode focusses on a particular ecosystem and the animals that have adapted to their environments. From the freezing waters that surround the Antarctic Peninsula and Tierra del Fuego, to the dryness of the Atacama Desert, which receives less precipitation than any other area on Earth, excluding the polar regions, the show highlights the unforgiving landscapes where animals and wildlife have had to adapt in order to survive.

programme.title: Wild Chile
programme.desc: The natural beauty of Chile is explored in this fascinating three-part documentary series from National Geographic, travelling the length, and width, of this unique, slender South American country. Each episode focusses on a particular ecosystem and the animals that have adapted to their environments. From the freezing waters that surround the Antarctic Peninsula and Tierra del Fuego, to the dryness of the Atacama Desert, which receives less precipitation than any other area on Earth, excluding the polar regions, the show highlights the unforgiving landscapes where animals and wildlife have had to adapt in order to survive.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Along Washington States rugged coast, Olympic National Park protects 1 million acres of diverse habitat. Coastal fog hits glacier-capped mountains, drenching the land in record rainfall and giving rise to temperate rainforests. This unique landscape hosts a rich biodiversity, including the endemic Olympic Marmot, Roosevelt elk, bobcats and one of the last Pacific salmon runs in the lower 48.

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Tropical South: Land of Water. Travel to southern Vietnams tropical habitats, home to gibbons and playful macaques, green sea turtles, and Asian black bears.

programme.title: Wild Chile
programme.desc: The natural beauty of Chile is explored in this fascinating three-part documentary series from National Geographic, travelling the length, and width, of this unique, slender South American country. Each episode focusses on a particular ecosystem and the animals that have adapted to their environments. From the freezing waters that surround the Antarctic Peninsula and Tierra del Fuego, to the dryness of the Atacama Desert, which receives less precipitation than any other area on Earth, excluding the polar regions, the show highlights the unforgiving landscapes where animals and wildlife have had to adapt in order to survive.

programme.title: National Parks: USA
programme.desc: Along Washington States rugged coast, Olympic National Park protects 1 million acres of diverse habitat. Coastal fog hits glacier-capped mountains, drenching the land in record rainfall and giving rise to temperate rainforests. This unique landscape hosts a rich biodiversity, including the endemic Olympic Marmot, Roosevelt elk, bobcats and one of the last Pacific salmon runs in the lower 48.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its winter on the farm, and the Pols are adding to their flock! The family is bringing in four merino ewes that were recently bred, which means with any luck the farm could be expecting its first lambs come springtime. And as winter fades into spring, the Pols prepare for the new arrivals by building a lambing pen. Meanwhile, Beth checks if her bees survived the winter.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin ventures into Australias notorious wetlands to discover three animals built for the muggy and wet environment. Phil comes face to face with the uniquely Australian freshwater crocodile, a massive predatory fish called the barramundi, and the saltwater crocodile, one of the worlds most dangerous animals and largest reptiles.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Water shapes northern Argentina, creating paradises for unique wildlife. Whether its sooty swifts swooping through waterfall floodwaters, frogs glowing in the dark, cute coati families in the undergrowth, or mighty anacondas on the prowl. Argentinas wetlands hold many wonders. In magnificent images, the film celebrates Argentinas water-rich north as a hotspot of biodiversity and shows how drought and fires threaten the fragile ecosystem.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols are preparing for sheep to give birth, which means figuring out how to catch and shear their four Merino ewes - no small task as this is new territory for everyone except Dr. Pol. Then, while helping his dad on a farm call, Charles has a terrifying accident. The whole family rallies together to care for Charles and take care of the farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its been a year of farming for the Pol family. Even with Charles recovering from his injury, the farms showing no signs of slowing down! Beth takes the next step with her bees to grow the colony and harvest honey. Charles and Ben come up with a final fix for the sheep huts drainage problem. The whole family comes together to plant the garden and celebrate a successful year on the farm.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Water shapes northern Argentina, creating paradises for unique wildlife. Whether its sooty swifts swooping through waterfall floodwaters, frogs glowing in the dark, cute coati families in the undergrowth, or mighty anacondas on the prowl. Argentinas wetlands hold many wonders. In magnificent images, the film celebrates Argentinas water-rich north as a hotspot of biodiversity and shows how drought and fires threaten the fragile ecosystem.

programme.title: Something Bit Me!
programme.desc: No Time to Be Terrified. In the San Gabriel Mountains, one false step turns a young couples romantic hike into a battle to save life and limb. And on a trip to the Zambezi River, avid nature photographers fall victim to one of Africas most lethal animals.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Water shapes northern Argentina, creating paradises for unique wildlife. Whether its sooty swifts swooping through waterfall floodwaters, frogs glowing in the dark, cute coati families in the undergrowth, or mighty anacondas on the prowl. programme.title: Something Bit Me!

programme.title: Something Bit Me!
programme.desc: If She Smells Im Alive.... In Wyoming, when an outdoorsman bags an elk, his kill attracts the forests apex predator. After fighting off his half-ton attacker with a kitchen knife, the hunter becomes a medical marvel.

programme.title: Something Bit Me!
programme.desc: Everything Went Dark.... A river guide in Zimbabwe meets his match in treacherous waters. Despite repeated maulings that leave him with 38 major bite wounds, he survives to tell his tale. In the Pacific Northwest, a civil servant suffers a very uncivilized fate.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Whether right whales, penguins or sea lions - for the birth of their young, many marine creatures are drawn to Argentinas nearly 5,000 kilometer coastline. From their very first breath, its all about one thing for the little ones: survival. Orcas hunt for young sea lions with a special technique and seagulls fly merciless aerial attacks on baby whales. Extraordinary underwater images and impressive animal behavior make the film by Christian Baumeister a visual experience.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: In Argentinas breathtaking, yet imposing wilderness, every day is a fight for survival. The terrain is rugged and parched. The air is thin. The weather can change in an instant. And then there are the predators. A female puma stalks a valley in search of guanaco, while a tarantula defends itself against a hungry armadillo. Foxes will scavenge what they can…until one of the worlds largest vultures shows up. All the while, in the background, glaciers greedily hold on to the freshwater these animals so desperately need.

programme.title: Wild Argentina: Extreme Earth
programme.desc: Water shapes northern Argentina, creating paradises for unique wildlife. Whether its sooty swifts swooping through waterfall floodwaters, frogs glowing in the dark, cute coati families in the undergrowth, or mighty anacondas on the prowl. Argentinas wetlands hold many wonders. In magnificent images, the film celebrates Argentinas water-rich north as a hotspot of biodiversity and shows how drought and fires threaten the fragile ecosystem.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol

programme.title: Tree Kangaroos: Ghosts of the Forest
programme.desc: Seldom seen and very rarely filmed in their natural environment, Lumholtz tree kangaroos are the ghosts of the north Queensland forests. This film follows the intimate lives of these tree-climbing specialists in the wilderness of the Atherton Tableland.

programme.title: Australias Land of the Ancients
programme.desc: Australias Land of the Ancients explores the unique and ancient landscape of northeastern Australia, the most biodiverse region on the continent. From Crocodiles lying in wait for fish and hunting feral pigs to caring marsupial mothers of the far north, the film highlights some of the incredible species as they struggle to survive in their harsh environment amid a changing landscape.

programme.title: Asias Killer Hornets
programme.desc: Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, shell quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines. These hornets will sacrifice everything to help raise legions of grubs and protect the hive at all costs.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopus are like aliens on earth but they have one superpower that we are only now beginning to fully appreciate. By changing their color hundreds of times an hour, or transforming the shape of their bodies to mimic their deadliest enemies, octopus are the most extraordinary shapeshifters on the planet.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins

programme.title: Asias Weirdest
programme.desc: Asias natural world is full of weird wildlife. The largest continent on Earth has more than its fair share of peculiar plants and abnormal animals, and this documentary series delves deep into its wild landscapes to reveal some of the strangest species on offer. Expect the unexpected in places like no other, as the series heads to extraordinary locations including the rugged islands of Indonesia and the grasslands of Mongolia.

programme.title: Croatias Coast
programme.desc: More than a mere holiday destination, the islands, mountains and forests of the Croatian coast reveal a world of unexpected wildlife and hidden natural treasures. Majestic raptors ride the winds while cicadas sing; geckos defy gravity and the blenny tidal pool-hops. In the mountains, the chamois, lynx and brown bears roam the Velebit range against the backdrop of the breathtaking Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Hunters of the Reef
programme.desc: Tropical coral reefs are the picture of colorful, light-dappled tranquility - but thats a scuba divers perspective. To the scaly and gilled inhabitants, its a fish-eat-fish environment ruled by pods of dolphins who prowl the area at mealtimes while everyone else runs for cover. Incredible weapons, camouflage, venomous defenses and exceptional strategies have evolved among the smaller hunters in constant competition. Lionfish hunt in packs, injecting any objectors with venom from their frilly spikes. The mantis shrimp has polarized vision and the fastest jab on the planet. Cuttlefish morph their skin to match the sand, then attack with tentacle harpoons. The hunt is on in the shifting tides!

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopus are like aliens on earth but they have one superpower that we are only now beginning to fully appreciate. By changing their color hundreds of times an hour, or transforming the shape of their bodies to mimic their deadliest enemies, octopus are the most extraordinary shapeshifters on the planet.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses break all the rules on animal intelligence. Born into the world as orphans, they are self-taught masterminds; capable of solving complex problems, strategizing, even planning for the future. Extraordinary superpowers that are the secret to their success.

programme.title: Secrets of the Octopus
programme.desc: Octopuses were always thought to be natures ultimate loners, preferring their own company. The truth is they have secret social lives. From moms to be hanging out in the deep in their hundreds to an octopus capable of coworking with another species. These aliens of nature are more sociable than ever imagined.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: The emperors are the largest and strongest of all penguins, living in the coldest, most extreme place on Earth. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory embeds with an Antarctic colony and encounters social skills never filmed before. As the planet rapidly warms, he discovers bonds forged from birth between family, friends and strangers are the difference between life and death.

programme.title: Secrets of the Penguins
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, a group of penguins left the ice in search of more. Riding powerful currents, the tiny adventurers arrived in strange new lands, reshaping traditions for deserts, tropics … and even among humans. They were tested to the extreme, becoming perhaps the smartest of them all. National Geographic Explorer Bertie Gregory discovers penguin problem solving, talking, and their enduring search for new worlds.

programme.title: Sharks Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie heads to South Africa for his most dangerous mission yet. The wild waters here are a hotspot for one of the oceans most famous and fearsome predators: the great white shark. Bertie will attempt to film them hunting seals underwater without the use of a protective cage. Its highly risky, but filming without the cage is the very best way to see them behaving naturally.

programme.desc: Every Asian giant hornet colony starts with a single queen. Leaving one hive to start another, shell quickly transform an empty lair into a bustling army of ruthless, efficient killing machines. These hornets will sacrifice everything to help raise legions of grubs and protect the hive at all costs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Netālu no Celtnieklīča parka reindžere Roza un Rabla komanda atklāj meteorītu. Kad Ātrmeistars un Megameistars mēģina to piesavināties, ķepaiņi izmanto savus milzīgos braucamos, lai izglābtu pilsētu un nogādātu meteorītu uz Zinātnes centru.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš lūdz jauno lietus mākonīti Klaudiju piepildīt izžuvušu ūdens slidkalniņu. Zābaciņam piemetas astiņkute, kuru var izārstēt burvju vardīte - ja vien nopelnīs savas burvju svītras, palīdzot draugiem lietusmežā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda uzbūvē māju vecā kokā - īstu štābiņu vairākos stāvos! Izbēg fermeres Zojas jaunās vistiņas, Rabla komandai darba pilnas rokas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Uz Padingtonu lielu iespaidu atstāj ugunsdzēsēju runa par drošību. Kad notiek īsta nelaime, Padingtons steidz palīgā. Mateo un Džūdija nodibina slepenu klubu koka mājā, bet liedz Džonatanam un Padingtonam tajā iestāties bez paroles.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par savu piedzīvojumiem pilno jaunību... un par to, kā uz ledus gabala satika Salatēvu. Pamanījis, ka barbabērni iznieko ūdeni, Barbatētis aicina viņus klausīties amizantu stāstu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz pūķītei Svītijai iemācīties lidot un atgriezties pie vecākiem Mākoņu alās. Kad Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa burvju triks liek Karalienei un Garnadzim samainīties vietām, Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz viņus pārvērst atpakaļ!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda. Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas. Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vīlers ar cūciņu Trifeli gatavo Ziemsvētku šovu, bet dubļi sasalst. Celtnieklīča bērni grasās doties izbraucienā ar kamanām, bet uz kalna nav sniega. Kur to ņemt?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons nejauši iznīcina vāveres riekstu krātuvi, tāpēc ielūdz savvaļas dzīvnieku dzīvot mājā. Džūdijai uzdāvina spiegošanas komplektu, Bērdas kundze sāk aizdomīgi izturēties, tāpēc bērni un Padingtons izseko viņu ar spiegu rīkiem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atklāj, ka Karija kunga atvaļinājuma laikā ir laistījis aplamu augu. Brauna kundze grib, lai Vindzoras dārzi mākslinieciski izpaužas. Padingtons nezina, kas ir māksla, tāpēc izlemj noskaidrot, kas viņam padodas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.
